translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

As our march must be firm and vigorous, I have instructed the Justice of the Peace of this parish to remove all the ponchos that have been made in the district and place them in the depot that I am going to create under the direction of Captain Francisco Xavier, Commander of the Northern site; and likewise to send them to citizen Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro, for him to forward to Your Excellency Your Excellency

God preserve Your Excellency Barracks in Mostardas, July 9, 1836. Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Colonel Bento Gonçalves da Silva. Superior Commander of the National Guard of this Province. Domingos José de Almeida, Colonel Chief of Legion.

Copy. Document written entirely on the back of document CV-200.
